summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that validate Numba‑accelerated spectrogram augmentation kernels for automatic speech recognition, checking gradient correctness, scalability to large batches, and handling of edge cases such as absent or extreme frequency and time masks.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and performance of the ASR data‑augmentation pipeline by detecting regressions and ensuring the Numba implementations work correctly under diverse conditions, thereby supporting robust model training and deployment.
